docs.snippet: Democrat Hillary Clinton led Republican Donald Trump by more than 5 percentage points in the Reuters/Ipsos tracking poll released on Friday, little changed in weeks as the U.S. presidential campaign wobbles into the heart of summer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democrat Hillary Clinton led Republican Donald Trump by more than 5 percentage points in the Reuters/Ipsos tracking poll released on Friday, little changed in weeks as the U.S. presidential campaign wobbles into the heart of summer.

headline.main: Clinton Leads Trump by 5 Points in White House Race-Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: Clinton Leads Trump by 5 Points in White House Race-Reuters/Ipsos Poll

docs.snippet: Republican Donald Trump on Friday backed away from comments calling President Barack Obama and Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton the founders of the militant group Islamic State, while the Republican Party sought to project unity behind their can...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican Donald Trump on Friday backed away from comments calling President Barack Obama and Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton the founders of the militant group Islamic State, while the Republican Party sought to project unity behind their candidate.

headline.main: Trump Backs Off ISIS Comments; Party Head Appears at Rallies in Show of Unity
headline.print_headline: Trump Backs Off ISIS Comments; Party Head Appears at Rallies in Show of Unity

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton on Friday released her 2015 tax returns, which showed the Democratic presidential nominee and her husband had $10.75 million in income that year and paid an effective federal tax rate of 34.2 percent....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton on Friday released her 2015 tax returns, which showed the Democratic presidential nominee and her husband had $10.75 million in income that year and paid an effective federal tax rate of 34.2 percent.

headline.main: Clintons Earned $10.75 Million in 2015, Paid 34.2 Percent Federal Tax Rate
headline.print_headline: Clintons Earned $10.75 Million in 2015, Paid 34.2 Percent Federal Tax Rate
